TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CacheRequest extends System.Object

summary.span: 指定在取得 時由使用者介面自動化架構快取的屬性和模式。

span.span: Specifies properties and patterns that the UI Automation framework caches when an is obtained.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 擷取屬性和模式，透過[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]需要可以拖慢效能的跨處理序呼叫。Retrieving properties and patterns through [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] requires cross-process calls that can slow down performance. 藉由快取屬性和模式，在批次作業中的值，您可以增強您的應用程式的效能。By caching values of proprieties and patterns in a batch operation, you can enhance the performance of your application. 呼叫類別建構函式，以建立新的快取要求。Create a new cache request by calling the class constructor. 要求由重複呼叫填入方法。The request is populated by repeated calls to the method. 只有一個可處於作用中。Only a single can be active. 有兩種方式可啟動要求：There are two ways to activate a request: - 呼叫要求。Call on the request. 此推送到堆疊上，要求，並在處置物件，則會彈出要求。This pushes the request onto the stack, and the request is popped when the object is disposed. 若要確保可供使用，即使引發例外狀況時，使用 從傳回的值內`using`區塊 (`Using` Visual Basic 中)。To ensure disposal even if an exception is raised, use the return value from within a `using` block (`Using` in Visual Basic). - 將要求放入內部堆疊中，藉由呼叫。Put the request onto the internal stack by calling . 只有在堆疊上的最上層要求為作用中，而且它必須是從堆疊移除的下一個。Only the topmost request on the stack is active, and it must be the next one removed from the stack by . 快顯要求，會停用它。Popping the request deactivates it. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 取得當要求為作用中的項目將已快取的屬性和模式所指定的值。 elements obtained while the request is active will have cached values for the properties and patterns specified. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用快取模式和屬性。The following example shows how to use to cache patterns and properties. [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#107](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#107)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#107](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#107)] 下列範例示範如何使用和快取模式和屬性。The following example shows how to use and to cache patterns and properties. [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#108](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#108)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#108](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#108)]

span.span: Sets this as the active specification for the items that are returned when an is requested on the same thread.

returns.span: 可用來處置 的物件。

span.span: The object that can be used to dispose the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法會使用通常偏好並做為啟動的。Using this method is usually preferable to using and as a means of activating the . 物件推送到堆疊時呼叫，並拉當它已處置。The object is pushed onto the stack when is called, and then popped off when it is disposed. 若要確保處置，放置內的傳回值`using`區塊 (`Using` Visual Basic 中)。To ensure disposal, place the return value within a `using` block (`Using` in Visual Basic). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用快取模式和屬性。The following example shows how to use to cache patterns and properties. summary.span: 將屬性或模式識別項加入至 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當建立物件時，識別碼做為預設屬性加入至快取。When a object is created, the identifier is added as a default property to cache. 新增快取要求的物件沒有任何作用。Adding an object that is already in the cache request has no effect.

summary.span: 取得或設定一個值，以指定傳回的項目是否應該包含對基礎[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 的完整參考，或只需要包含快取的資訊。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether returned elements should contain full references to the underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)], or only cached information.

value.span: 如果傳回的項目包含對基礎[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 的完整參考，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the returned elements have a full reference to the underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是預設值，並指定傳回的項目包含基礎的完整參考[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]。 is the default value, and specifies that returned elements contain a full reference to the underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]. 指定傳回的項目不必參考基礎[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]，和只要包含快取資訊。 specifies that the returned elements have no reference to the underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)], and contain only cached information. 某些作業項目，包括， ，和，需要完整的參考; 嘗試執行這些上並沒有任何項目會導致。Certain operations on elements, including , , and , require a full reference; attempting to perform these on an element that has none results in an . 使用因為它避免額外負荷可能更有效率，當只有屬性，則需要參與設定完整的參考。Using can be more efficient when only properties are needed, as it avoids the overhead involved in setting up full references. ## Examples 在下列範例中，設為、 與結果，只快取屬性和模式可供擷取的物件。In the following example, is set to , with the result that only cached properties and patterns are available for the retrieved object. [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#108](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#108)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#108](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#108)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Pop() cil managed

summary.span: 從目前執行緒的內部堆疊中移除使用中 。

span.span: Removes the active from the internal stack for the current thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有目前作用中的要求可以使用來移除方法。Only the currently active request can be removed using the method. 嘗試移除的要求，不目前一個導致例外狀況。Attempting to remove a request that is not the current one results in an exception. 除非您巢狀結構快取要求，建議您最好使用放置在堆疊上的要求。Unless you are nesting cache requests, it is preferable to use to place the request on the stack. 原因是，您可以使用內`using`區塊 (`Using` Visual Basic 中)，確保要求從堆疊中取出，即使引發例外狀況。The reason is that you can use within a `using` block (`Using` in Visual Basic), ensuring that the request is popped off the stack even if an exception is raised. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何停用使用。The following example shows how to deactivate a by using . [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#108](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#108)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#108](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#108)]

exception.span: 嘗試移除並非最後一個推入堆疊的快取要求。

span.span: An attempt was made to remove a cache request that was not the last one pushed onto the stack.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Push() cil managed

summary.span: 將 放入內部狀態堆疊，成為目前執行緒的使用中要求。

span.span: Places the on the internal state stack, making it the active request on the current thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 多個物件可以放到狀態堆疊。Multiple objects can be placed onto the state stack. 必須從它們已推入; 的順序中的堆疊中移除快取要求否則，引發的例外狀況。Cache requests must be removed from the stack in the order they were pushed on; otherwise, an exception is raised. 除非您巢狀結構快取要求，建議您最好使用放置在堆疊上的要求。Unless you are nesting cache requests, it is preferable to use to place the request on the stack. 原因是，您可以使用內`using`區塊 (`Using` Visual Basic 中)，確保要求從堆疊中取出，即使引發例外狀況。The reason is that you can use within a `using` block (`Using` in Visual Basic), ensuring that the request is popped off the stack even if an exception is raised. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何啟用使用。The following example shows how to activate a by using . [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#108](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#108)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#108](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#108)]

summary.span: 取得或設定一個值，以指定在快取時使用的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]項目樹狀目錄的檢視。

span.span: Gets or sets a value specifying the view of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element tree to use when caching.
The view of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element tree.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需其他有關的檢視[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]項目樹狀目錄中，請參閱 < [UI Automation Tree Overview](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-tree-overview.md)。For additional information on views of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element tree, see [UI Automation Tree Overview](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-tree-overview.md). ## Examples 在下列範例中，設為使快取是為所有的項目，不論它們是否屬於內容檢視或控制項檢視。In the following example, is set to so that caching is done for all elements, regardless of whether they are part of the content view or the control view. summary.span: 取得或設定一個值，以指定是否只快取樹狀子目錄的根項目，或也要快取子系或子代。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether caching is done only for the root of the subtree, or also for its children or descendants.

value.span: 、、 或 其中一個或多個。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 快取的範圍相對於或多個物件正在擷取，不是依據其上的物件或呼叫。The scope of caching is in relation to the object or objects being fetched, not in relation to the object on which or is called. 請參閱範例。See the example. ## Examples 在下列範例中，清單方塊項目取自父視窗項目，同時作用中並是。In the following example, a list box element is obtained from the parent window element while a is active and is . 指定之屬性的子項目 （也就是清單項目） 會儲存在快取，而且可以從擷取清單方塊。The specified properties of the child elements (that is, the list items) are stored in the cache and can be retrieved from the of the list box. [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#119](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#119)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#119](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#119)]
